Created an attachment (id=15355)
File that demonstrates the problem

delete lines 107-109 (inclusive), don't save.
"revert to saved" and the error appears.

I can't reproduce it.
I select the text from line 107 column 0 to line 109 column 10. I tried to 
delete the selection using backspace and delete key. I tried with HEAD and 
3.0.1 Eclipse.

Please, try:
1) using Eclipse from HEAD
2) reproduce the problem with the file out of the classpath (so it isn't 
compiled).
3) test if your machine is BiDi enable, if you have SWT loaded just right a 
small app that prints to the console the result of BidiUtil#isBidiPlatform().

same stacktrace.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 82710 ***
